name: MDAS Tactics
description:
Description

Get ready to defend your base and sharpen your math skills with this engaging tower defense game! Solve equations quickly and accurately to launch your attacks and defeat the enemy. With each level presenting more challenging math problems, you'll have a blast improving your skills while having fun. Perfect for anyone looking for a  casual gaming experience that's both entertaining and educational.

Mechanics

Solve the equation and click the correct answer.

Resources:

  • Flat Icoon & UI - 2D Puzzle Game UI | 2D Icons | Unity Asset Store
  • Free Music Tracks For Games | Audio Music | Unity Asset Store
  • FREE Casual Game SFX Pack | Audio Sound FX | Unity Asset Store
